item.title: O
item.description: score:161 Chances: More growth than expected and a massive cost-cutting effort are under way. Many REITs produce higher returns with less volatility than the S&P 500. Real estate you visit frequently could supply you with a lifetime of passive income. Invest in stability, dividends, and growth with these three accomplished real estate operators.
